description: For the merge https://review.openstack.org/#change,1071 there needs to be documentation for how to use that extension. You can use the RST template or DocBook template for extension documentation.
title: Extension documentation required for os-console-output extension

comments.content: For the merge https://review.openstack.org/#change,1071 there needs to be documentation for how to use that extension. You can use the RST template or DocBook template for extension documentation.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle

comments.content:
I'm not sure since this is quite old, but looks to me that it's been fixed.  Os-console-output extension has only one method and it's documented.
If anyone finds / knows of something to fix, or think this can be closed, let me know.
Thanks!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ladquin

comments.content: I agree with Laura that this bug should be closed as the extension is now documented in OpenStack API Reference.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lauria
